page.title: 13MINUTES OF TEDBURN P.C. 2/2
page.content: {Pathfinder Light:} {School Transport: {Listed Buildings:}If anyone knows of any specific buildings that might require listing, please contact the Chairman. The D of E have appointed architects to carry out a re-Survey of historic buildings. {Local Government Access to Information {Campaign: {Domesday Project:}It was agreed that Tedburn Schoool be allowed to include a portion of minutes. No objection from councillors as complete anonymity will be maintained. {Action Van:}It was requested that the clerk find out more information about this Dartington Fitness Programme. {Planning:}Function room at Methodist Church - GRANTED. Outline application for erection of dwelling on land adjoining St Vincents - REFUSED. etc.
